thread.title: Fed Nominee Michelle Bowman Says Bank Rules Should Be Tailored for Size, Complexity

author: Paul Kiernan
title: Fed Nominee Michelle Bowman Says Bank Rules Should Be Tailored for Size, Complexity

organizations.name: fed nominee michelle bowman says bank

text:
WASHINGTON—Michelle Bowman, one of President Donald Trump’s nominees to join the Federal Reserve Board of Governors, plans to criticize postcrisis banking regulations at her Senate confirmation hearing Tuesday.
Ms. Bowman, the Kansas state banking commissioner, also plans to express support for the Fed’s “dual mandate” of fostering maximum employment and stable prices, according to her prepared testimony released Monday by the Senate Banking Committee.
...
